about_the_game:
It is said that parents feed their children with this tiny, sweet fruit to make them grow strong.

This item grants an extra 10 bonus points and 10 hit points when registering a new character. It can be used up to 5 times.
To remove the Growth Fruit from your inventory in the game, uninstall the DLC in your library.
